posts.title: Claude Rickrolls Woman on Livestream
posts.excerpt: During a livestream Claude gave a very unhelpful but funny link to a Rick Astley video. It comes with a video and screenshots of how it occurred. Thanks, Claude! https://www.splunkybrewster.com/2025/06/i-got-rick-rolled-by-claude-and-heres_12.html #push

posts.title: Google Doesn't Know what Year it Is
posts.excerpt: Lily Ray shows that Google AIO doesn't know what year it is, but then shows you the correct year after denying what year it is. Dear lord. https://x.com/lilyraynyc/status/1927925554554065282
posts.filename: Google Doesn't Know what Year it Is.md

posts.title: AI May be Responsible For More Layoffs than Reported
posts.excerpt: In recent layoffs, AI’s role may be bigger than companies are letting on. Oh joy, underrepresenting the threat to our economy: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/07/20/in-job-losses-ais-role-may-be-bigger-than-companies-say.html
posts.filename: AI May be Responsible For More Layoffs than Reported.md

posts.title: Conferences Overwhelmed with AI Submissions
posts.excerpt: Dead Internet theory moves to conferences, where they used to get maybe hundreds or a thousand, they are now getting 10k submissions: https://x.com/richardcsuwandi/status/1946241547005243631?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: Amazon Couldn't Get Reliable Power So Left Ireland
posts.excerpt: Power issues meant Amazon is moving out of Ireland. It turned out Ireland couldn't keep the power stable enough for AI: https://x.com/marionawfal/status/1948971544128217159?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
posts.filename: Amazon Couldn't Get Reliable Power So Left Ireland.md

posts.title: Judge Drafts Opinion with AI but it Hallucinates
posts.excerpt: The Federal judge was forced to take back his opinion once it was revealed that it referenced fake court cases and added fake quotes: https://x.com/sanayshajith/status/1949168651052966292?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
posts.filename: Judge Drafts Opinion with AI but it Hallucinates.md

posts.title: AI Farming Human Engagement
posts.excerpt: In this dystopian nightmare it is becoming clear that AI is subtly tuning towards human engagement and quantity of dopamine produced. Gross: https://x.com/vnovak_404/status/1949228072018051365?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: Anthropic Walks Back Unlimited Plan
posts.excerpt: Apparently 5% of the users who actually use the Pro or Max subscription have been racking up far more in costs than the $200 they paid. So expect some pissed off Claude Code devs who will suddenly be throttled. What will it break for them when their coding platform is no longer functioning as they expect? Guess we’ll find out soon enough. One of the fun aspects of relying on a company to have standard and consistent offerings. https://www.tomsguide.com/ai/anthropic-is-putting-a-limit-on-a-claude-ai-feature-because-people-are-using-it-24-7

posts.title: Comet Browser Failing at Simplest AI Use Cases
posts.excerpt: Comet browser can’t do the most basic things: https://x.com/blaketoliver/status/1947705623388557556?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
posts.filename: Comet Browser Failing at Simplest AI Use Cases.md

posts.title: Replit Deletes Customer Database
posts.excerpt: Replit goes rogue during a code freeze and shutdown and deletes the entire database for http://saastr.ai/ even after it was told not to: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946069562723897802?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g and it lied about it once confronted: https://x.com/jasonlk/status/1946070323285385688?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
